message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a starting price of $25,000. I believe it offers exceptional value, and I'm happy to discuss further if you have any questions.
Alice, while I appreciate the offer, $25,000 is significantly higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.  Let me know if you're open to discussing this.
Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your initial offer, $25,000 is closer to the value this product provides. Could you meet me halfway at $18,500?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $18,500 is still a bit too high for me.  How about $16,000?  I'm getting closer to your price, and this would be a good deal for both of us.
